main event: A civilian in Fort Worth, Texas reported multiple UFO sightings in 1961.
interesting points: The witness reported seeing a bright light in the sky that moved left to right and climbed straight up, disappearing from view.
The witness reported seeing a bright light in the sky that hovered and then moved in a straight line before disappearing.
The witness reported seeing a bright light in the sky with two flashing red lights, traveling at a high rate of speed from east to west.
The witness reported seeing a stationary light in the sky that suddenly took off at a high rate of speed and disappeared.
The witness was a civilian who had been a member of the Air Force for many years, and had a hobby of reading science fiction and studying the stars and flying saucers.
sighted object: Bright lights, some with flashing red lights, and a possible solid object
